Control Name: 2.4.7 Black-box monitoring is used to measure platform services and the resulting customer experience.
Control Statement: Black-box monitoring tests externally visible application behavior without knowledge of the internals of the system. This is a common approach to measuring customer-centric SLIs/SLOs/SLAs.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.4 How are you monitoring your resources?
control_attributes.Control: 2.4.7 Black-box monitoring is used to measure platform services and the resulting customer experience.
